T02D2773:145b-0: @145b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug me dpung 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2773:145b-1: bsod nams ye shes tshogs myur du //
T02D2773:145b-2: dngos grub byed dang zang zid rnyed //
T02D2773:145b-3: gzi brjid bskyed dang mthu bskyed dang //
T02D2773:145b-4: sdig 'joms bya phyir me dpung mchod //
T02D2773:145b-5: dam tshig can gyis sngon du lha 'dris par byas nas nags dben par song ste /
T02D2773:145b-7: khru gang pa dang mtho gang pa'i tshad kyi shing bu bzang po bsrung ba blangs te /
T02D2773:145b-8: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang lhan cig
T02D2773:145b-9: pa'i dad pa drag pos mchod pa'i yid ma brjed
T02D2773:145b-10: par byas la / ji tsam rigs par mchod rten gyi gzugs lta bur brtsig go //
T02D2773:145b-11: ji skad zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tu //
T02D2773:145b-12: gang bsrung sreg rdzas mchod pa'i rkyen //
T02D2773:145b-13: de dag thams cad 'di shes bya //
T02D2773:145b-14: khyad par du ni rab bsngags brgyad //
T02D2773:145b-15: sa yi bdag po'i yo byad rung ba sna tshogs phye mar byas pa dang //
T02D2773:145b-16: dbang phyug rnams kyi 'bru nor dang ni de bzhin tshong dus chen po'i sa //
T02D2773:146a-0: gzi ldan mthu chen skra dang sen mo'i @146a * //
T02D2773:146a-1: 'tsho ba'i dang por byas pa'i phud //
T02D2773:146a-2: rang nyid lus skyes dri ma sna tshogs phun sum tshogs min ling ga'o //
T02D2773:146a-3: de la thog ma kho nar me sbar ba dang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin byas te /
T02D2773:146a-4: 'bar ba'i dbus su ye shes kyi lha spyan drangs te /
T02D2773:146a-5: mchod pa dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas sreg
T02D2773:146a-6: rdzas dbul zhing rab tu bsngags pa'i chus yang dang
T02D2773:146a-7: yang du khrus gsol ba dang bsad gtor bya'o //
T02D2773:146a-8: de nas yang mchod pa la sogs pa thams cad
T02D2773:146a-9: byas te glu dang gar dang rol mo la sogs
T02D2773:146a-10: pa btab cing pi wang bsgreng ba dang lhan cig
T02D2773:146a-11: tu man ngag dang ldan pas phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2773:146a-12: ma yin pa'i ling ga bsregs la bzla'o //
T02D2773:146a-13: aom a'a: hr'i: aa ki ni dzva la dzra la ma h'a dzva g'a tro //
T02D2773:146a-14: ma ma ta mu ge las che ge mo thams cad siddha siddha ma h'a k'a ru ni ka ho:/
T02D2773:146a-16: me dpung 'bar ba sbyan ras gzigs dbang me yi las //
T02D2773:146a-17: mchod pa gang brnyes zhal gcig phyag gnyis dza ka'i mdog /
T02D2773:146a-18: shin tu gzi brjid sgrub po'i bsod nams sgrub brtson pa //
T02D2773:146a-19: yid bzhin nor bu med thab g-yas g-yon 'dzin pa yin //
T02D2773:146a-20: de yi las sgrub me yi bu zhes bya ba'i lha //
T02D2773:146a-21: rkang pa gnyis bteg dga' ba'i gzi mdangs dkar dmar
T02D2773:146a-22: mdog / rin chen phreng thogs nyid kyi thugs ka
T02D2773:146a-23: las 'ongs nas // sbyin bdag mdun sdong don kun nges par bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2773:146a-24: de yis sras bcas lha mchog gnyis //
T02D2773:146a-25: mnyes gyur rmi lam nang du ston //
T02D2773:146a-26: de nas gshegs gsol thal ba bsdus //
T02D2773:146a-27: dbung pa g-yas su gdags par bya //
T02D2773:146a-28: thugs rje chen po me yi lha //
T02D2773:146a-29: de yi nyin mo tshur bcad la //
T02D2773:146a-30: rtag tu bu sdug lta bur ni //
T02D2773:146a-31: dgongs gyur 'dod pa thams cad sgrub //
